article: a judge dismissed a conspiracy charge against rep. tom delay but refused to throw out far more serious allegations of money-laundering , dashing the congressman 's hopes for now of reclaiming his post as house majority leader .
abstract: judge upholds some of the charges against rep. tom delay

delay is still expected to be stripped of his leadership post.
